cmatrix.description: Matrix style terminal effects. So cool!

fortune.description: Random fortune or a funny quote

cowsay.description: Cow says something you want it to say. Try out various styles of cow

lolcat.description: Colorful painter in terminal by a cat.

asciiquarium.description: Miss fishing? Well you can sure see fishes in terminal getting fished.

hollywood.description: Hollywood style effects in terminal. Makes you a pro instantly!

edex-ui.description: A cross-platform, customizable science fiction terminal emulator with advanced monitoring & touchscreen support. Make an alias to run the software.

bb.description: Runs an ASCII art demo with music.

nyancat.description: Shows an animated ASCII Nyan Cat.
